item.title: 空客 2024 年交付约 760 架喷气机，比年度目标少 10 架
item.description: 空中客车公司（Airbus SE）在上个月向客户交付了约760架飞机，仅差一点就能实现2024年的年度交付目标。【原文：Airbus SE fell just short of meeting its annual delivery target for 2024 by handing over about 760 aircraft to customers following a last-month spurt that helped the company overcome a slow start to the year.】

item.title: 欧洲央行斯托纳拉斯称秋季前后利率将达到 2% 左右
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员亚尼斯-斯托纳拉斯（Yannis Stournaras）表示，借贷成本可能会在今年秋季左右降至 2% 左右。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras said borrowing costs will probably be lowered to about 2% around the autumn of this year.】

item.title: 钴价暴跌后矿商 Jervois 签订拯救协议
item.description: 由于电池金属价格暴跌，钴矿商 Jervois Global Ltd. 在与中国竞争对手的竞争中举步维艰，作为与其一家贷款机构达成的重组协议的一部分，该公司将实现私有化。【原文：Cobalt miner Jervois Global Ltd. will go private as part of a restructuring deal with one of its lenders, after struggling to compete with Chinese rivals as prices for the battery metal plunged.】

item.title: Constellation Energy 与美国政府签署 10 亿美元电力协议
item.description: 星座能源公司（Constellation Energy Corp. ）已与美国政府签署了两份协议，将提供超过 10 亿美元的电力和服务，足以资助升级项目，从而提高美国最大核电厂的产能。【原文：Constellation Energy Corp. has signed a pair of deals with the US government to provide more than $1 billion of electricity and services, enough to fund upgrade projects that will boost capacity at the country’s biggest nuclear fleet.】

item.title: 2025 年我们将谈论的 13 个重大事件
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 加拿大加密产业从美国大选获胜中吸取教训
item.description: 继加密货币行业在去年美国大选中取得引人注目的成功之后，加拿大的数字资产公司已经开始运用他们所学到的知识。【原文：Following the high-profile successes of the crypto industry in last year’s US elections, digital-asset companies in Canada are already applying what they’ve learned.】

item.title: 芬兰开始对被扣油轮 Eagle S 进行港口国检查
item.description: 上周，芬兰开始对因海底电缆破裂而被扣留的 "鹰S "号油轮进行所谓的港口国控制检查，以查明该船是否符合国际安全规范。【原文：Finland began a so-called port state control inspection of the detained Eagle S tanker that’s being held after undersea cable ruptures last week, seeking to probe if the vessel meets international safety norms.】

item.title: 福特和通用汽车掀起一月高等级债券狂潮
item.description: 周四，多家蓝筹股公司在美国投资级一级债务市场启动了发行工作，承销商们正在为债券销售最繁忙的一个一月做好准备。【原文：A slew of blue-chip firms kicked off issuance in the US investment-grade primary debt market on Thursday, as underwriters brace for what’s expected to be one of the busiest Januaries for bond sales.】

item.title: 尼日利亚电信公司寻求将价格翻番以维持经济发展
item.description: 尼日利亚电信公司正在游说监管机构，要求允许将资费提高一倍，以应对严峻的经济形势和接近三十年高位的通货膨胀。【原文：Nigerian telecommunication companies are lobbying their regulator for permission to double price tariffs to weather harsh economic conditions and inflation running near a three-decade high.】

item.title: 美国 2024 年首次申请失业救济人数降至八个月低点
item.description: 2024 年美国初次失业申请人数创下八个月来的新低，反映出在一个保持着令人惊讶的韧性的劳动力市场中，裁员幅度相对较小。【原文：Initial applications for US unemployment capped 2024 at an eight-month low, reflecting the relatively muted levels of job cuts in a labor market that has remained surprisingly resilient.】

item.title: 即使美联储放宽政策，投资者仍连续第四年抛售黄金 ETF
item.description: 2024 年，尽管黄金价格屡创新高，美联储也开始放宽货币政策，但投资者仍连续第四年抛售黄金支持的交易所交易基金。【原文：Investors sold off gold-backed exchange-traded funds for a fourth straight year in 2024 despite a backdrop of repeated record high prices and the start of monetary easing by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 庞氏骗局丑闻后，土耳其提议限制银行首席执行官任期
item.description: 土耳其银行业监管机构制定了一项限制银行高管任期的计划，该计划是在一家银行被高调指控存在庞氏骗局之后提出的，该银行的首席执行官是土耳其任职时间最长的首席执行官之一。【原文：Turkey’s banking regulator has drawn up a plan to restrict the tenures of banking executives, a proposal that comes after high-profile accusations of a ponzi scheme at a bank with one of the nation’s longest-serving chief executive officers.】

item.title: 负价格现象加剧，德国电力跌破零点
item.description: 德国电力价格在今年的第一个交易日跌破零点，随着可再生能源的扩大，这种现象在欧洲日益频繁。【原文：German power prices dropped below zero on the first trading day of the year, an increasingly frequent phenomenon in Europe as renewables expand.】

item.title: TikTok 和特朗普必将引发社交媒体混乱之年
item.description: 随着 2025 年的到来，一年后的社交媒体格局可能会大不一样，但首先....。【原文：As we kick off 2025, the social-media landscape could look a lot different a year from now, but first….】

item.title: 中国 2025 年的增长取决于与多方面风暴的斗争
item.description: 我是驻香港的亚洲经济记者 Katia Dmitrieva。今天我们关注中国的未来一年。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Katia Dmitrieva, Asia economics correspondent in Hong Kong. Today we’re looking at China’s year ahead. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美国港口谈判将于下周重启，以避免代价高昂的罢工
item.description: 在长达七周的僵局之后，美国东海岸和墨西哥湾沿岸的港口运营商和他们雇用的码头工人似乎将回到谈判桌前。【原文：US port operators along the East and Gulf coasts and the longshoremen they employ to keep cargo flowing look set to return to the negotiating table after a seven-week-long stalemate.】

item.title: 巴西矿商提高稀土产量，挑战中国的控制力
item.description: 在中美贸易摩擦日益加剧之际，巴西矿产商 Serra Verde 集团正在提高稀土金属的产量。【原文：Brazilian miner Serra Verde Group is boosting production of rare earth metals at a time of growing trade friction between the US and China, the world’s dominant supplier of minerals critical to technology.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率升至 7 月初以来最高点，抑制了需求
item.description: 美国抵押贷款利率在圣诞假期周期间攀升至近六个月的新高，抑制了购房申请，并严重削弱了再融资活动。【原文：US mortgage rates climbed to an almost six-month high during the Christmas holiday week, suppressing applications for home purchases and severely undercutting refinancing activity.】

item.title: 美联储开始降息，国债实现年度上涨
item.description: 美国国债市场在 2024 年末小幅收涨，原因是通胀率在第一季度后恢复走低，美联储三次降息。【原文：The US Treasury market ended 2024 with a small gain as inflation resumed edging lower after the first quarter and the Federal Reserve cut interest rates three times.】

item.title: 智利经济活动连续两个月温和增长
item.description: 由于实际工资增长和中央银行的降息周期逐渐支持了经济活动，智利经济在 11 月份连续第二个月实现扩张。【原文：Chile’s economy expanded for the second straight month in November as real wage growth and the central bank’s cycle of interest rate cuts gradually support activity.】

item.title: 出口疲软使英国工厂的乐观情绪降至两年来最低点
item.description: 由于出口下滑和全球贸易紧张局势加剧，英国制造商的信心在 12 月份跌至两年来的最低点。【原文：Confidence among British manufacturers tumbled to a two-year low in December amid a slump in exports and mounting global trade tensions.】

item.title: 表现最佳的非洲股票指数有望在 2025 年扩大涨幅
item.description: 加纳的基准股指是去年非洲表现最好的股指，由于投资者押注即将上任的约翰-马哈马总统政府将恢复经济稳定，该股指将在 2025 年扩大涨幅。【原文：Ghana’s benchmark stock index, Africa’s best performer last year, is set to extend gains in 2025 as investors bet incoming President John Mahama government will restore economic stability.】

item.title: 2025 年伊始，印度股市表现优于亚洲主要同业
item.description: 新年伊始，印度股市反弹，表现优于亚洲最大的同业。【原文：Indian stocks rallied at the beginning of the new year to outperform their biggest Asian peers.】

item.title: 2025 年的市场：特朗普主导华尔街预测
item.description: 从唐纳德-特朗普（Donald J. Trump）重返白宫，到美国资产价格狂飙，再到债券守夜人的威胁— 以下是金融界的精英们对未来一年的看法。在今天的彭博大观察中，我们将介绍来自 50 多家领先金融机构的 700 多条重要观点。其中有几个亮点：【原文：From the return of Donald J. Trump to the White House to wildly expensive US assets to the threat of bond vigilantes — here’s what the finance world’s best and brightest see in the year ahead.In today’s Bloomberg Big Take, we present over 700 key calls from more than 50 leading financial institutions. A few of the highlights:】

item.title: 欧元兑美元跌至 2022 年以来最弱水平
item.description: 由于对欧洲经济和与美国货币政策分歧的担忧，欧元兑美元汇率跌至两年多来的最弱水平。【原文：The euro fell to its weakest level versus the dollar in over two years amid concerns about Europe’s economy and monetary policy divergence with the US.】

item.title: 为什么肥胖症药物革命仍在进行中？
item.description: 事实证明，一类被称为 GLP-1s 的新型减肥药改变了肥胖症患者的生活方式。它们也为制药公司，尤其是开发这些药物的礼来公司和诺和诺德公司赚取了数十亿美元。然而，人们对这些神奇药物的兴趣也带来了一些挑战。不仅保险公司有时不愿意支付这些每年高达 16,000 美元的药物费用，而且药物的持续短缺也为制药公司创造了机会。【原文：A new class of weight-loss drugs known as GLP-1s are proving to be game changers for people with obesity. They’re also minting billions for pharmaceutical companies, especially the companies that developed them, Eli Lilly & Co. and Novo Nordisk A/S. Yet the interest in these miracle drugs has presented some challenges. Not only are insurance companies sometimes balking at paying for the medications, which can cost as much as $16,000 a year, but ongoing shortages have created opportunities fo】

item.title: 特鲁多离开加拿大陷入悬疑，焦虑的自由党人敦促他离开
item.description: 假期已经结束，加拿大政坛却被一个问题所困扰：贾斯汀-特鲁多什么时候能给我们答复？【原文：The holiday period is over and Canadian politics is gripped by a single question: when will the country hear from Justin Trudeau?】

item.title: 会议记录显示，瑞典央行在最终减息前将避免更长时间的停顿
item.description: 瑞典央行行长们可能不愿在最终降低借贷成本之前等待更长的时间，即使他们对货币政策的变化采取了更加耐心的态度。【原文：Swedish central bankers are likely to resist a longer wait before a final reduction in borrowing costs even as they are adopting a more patient approach to changes in monetary policy.】

item.title: 预报北欧将出现冰雪天气，天然气储备将耗尽
item.description: 由于欧洲天然气库存以 2021 年以来最快的速度下降，英国在未来几天将面临冰雪天气，而北欧国家也将面临严寒。【原文：The UK is bracing for snow and ice over the next few days, while Nordic countries also face freezing temperatures as European gas inventories fall at the fastest pace since 2021.】

item.title: 2025 年的大辩论黄金还是比特币？
item.description:
一个已作为资产使用了数千年，而另一个还不到二十年。但两者都刚刚度过了辉煌的一年。【原文：

One has been used as an asset for thousands of years; the other less than two decades. But both just had a banner year. 

】
